about_the_game:
Store Wars: Prologue - Multiplayer Shop Simulator is a limited version of the full game designed to familiarize players with the gameplay prior to wish listing or purchasing.

Get a taste of the grocery store showdown with Store Wars: Prologue! In this limited version of Store Wars: Multiplayer Shop Simulator, up to 16 friends can get a hands-on experience of the fast-paced, competitive fun. Start small, learn the ropes, and decide if you’re ready for the full game experience. Please note: Some features are exclusive to the full version.

Play with up to 16 Friends
Help operate one of four stores in the chaos of a town filled with up to 16 friends wildly running around. It's competitive, it's hectic, and it's an absolute blast! 

PVE & PVP

Choose to play solo, with friends, or against them, in one of four customizable stores. Store Wars can be as relaxing or chaotic as you make it! 

Grow and Expand Your Store
Upgrade your store, place new shelves, and watch as your business thrives. Expand your space and attract more customers to become the ultimate grocery tycoon. Please note: Only a few upgrades and licenses are available in the Prologue version of the game.

Check Out Customers and Stock Shelves
Keep your store running smoothly by quickly checking out customers and restocking shelves. Efficiency is key to staying ahead of your competitors!

Lighthearted Sabotage
Unleash your creativity in disrupting rival stores. Whether it's throwing something unexpected or causing a bit of chaos, sabotage has never been this fun!

name: Store Wars: Prologue - Multiplayer Shop Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2070
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Play solo or with up to 16 friends in a chaotic grocery store prologue! Manage, grow, and compete against rival stores in a fun, lighthearted battle of wits and strategy. Who will be the ultimate grocery tycoon? Store Wars: Prologue - Multiplayer Shop Simulator is a limited version of the full game.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Italian
